评论概述: Thin but comfy with raglan sleeves
评论详情: Fabric is a little thin but soft and comfy. Washes  and dries well.  Nice length with raglan sleeves.

Here’s what I liked: it’s super soft and very comfortable, I feel like it’s sized correctly. Based on other reviews I sized up and probably shouldn’t have.  Here’s what I didn’t like: it leaves fuzz on your chair and the fabric balled up where anything touches or rubs. It’s a longer sweater so you can tell where you sit on it or where your lanyard rubs. Those areas are more worn after wearing it once. It’s not what I was expecting as far as fabric. It’s almost like a velvet kind of material on the raised portions. I don’t see this sweater lasting for the long haul, maybe one season at best.
It's shorter than the picture and VERY see through. Definitely need to double layer. The cut is also very boxy. Snug on chest and hips, but very baggy on waist.
